commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: And we are underway here in Edmonton! The first period is beginning with the Florida Panthers holding a 5-4 lead over the Oilers.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: That's right. Aleksander Barkov set the tone early, winning the opening faceoff against Leon Draisaitl. Look for that matchup to be a key factor throughout this game.
